meanings.sent1: I hailed a cab to take me to the airport.
meanings.sent2: The cab driver knew all the shortcuts in the city.
meanings.sent3: The cab driver told a joke that made me laugh all the way to my destination.
meanings.sent4: In the bustling city, the yellow cab stood out like a beacon of hope.
meanings.sent5: The neon sign on the cab glowed brightly in the night, beckoning passengers.

meanings.definition: The compartment of a truck where the driver sits
meanings.sent1: The cab of the truck was spacious and comfortable.
meanings.sent2: The driver adjusted the mirrors before starting the engine in the cab.
meanings.sent3: The cab of the truck felt like a cozy little office on wheels.
meanings.sent4: From the cab, the driver had a clear view of the road ahead.
meanings.sent5: The radio in the cab played upbeat music as the truck rumbled along.

meanings.sent1: The cab driver guided the horse-drawn cab through the busy streets.
meanings.sent2: People waved from the sidewalks as the cab passed by.
meanings.sent3: The horse pulling the cab seemed to enjoy the attention from passersby.
meanings.sent4: The sound of hooves on the cobblestone announced the arrival of the cab.
meanings.sent5: The cab driver skillfully maneuvered the horse-drawn cab through the narrow alleyways.

meanings.definition: A small room or compartment on a ship
meanings.sent1: The captain's quarters were located near the cab of the ship.
meanings.sent2: The crew gathered in the cab for their daily briefing.
meanings.sent3: During the storm, the rocking motion made the cab feel like a cozy nest.
meanings.sent4: The captain emerged from the cab with a map in hand, ready to navigate.
meanings.sent5: The wooden door to the cab creaked open as the first mate entered.

meanings.definition: A unit of measurement for volume of wood
meanings.sent1: The lumberjack measured the woodpile in cords and cabs.
meanings.sent2: Each cab of wood was neatly stacked in the storage shed.
meanings.sent3: The cab of firewood was just enough to keep the fireplace burning all night.
meanings.sent4: The carpenter estimated the project would require several cabs of timber.
meanings.sent5: The delivery truck was loaded with cabs of wood for the construction site.
